title: Installation of mesa fails when installing Visit
body:
Installation of mesa fails when installing Visit.

### Expected Result

Installation of Visit.

### Actual Result

Install of mesa failed with the following error message:
```
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j32'

6 errors found in build log:
     1175    gallivm/lp_bld_format_aos.c:594:17: warning: 'res' may be used uninitialized in this function [-Wmaybe-uninitialized]
     1176                 res = LLVMBuildOr(builder, res, rgba[j], "");
     1177                     ^
     1178      CC       vl/vl_stubs.lo
     1179      CCLD     libgalliumvl_stub.la
     1180    gallivm/lp_bld_misc.cpp: In function 'LLVMOpaqueBuilder* lp_create_builder(LLVMContextRef, lp_float_mode)':
  >> 1181    gallivm/lp_bld_misc.cpp:833:13: error: 'class llvm::FastMathFlags' has no member named 'setUnsafeAlgebra'
     1182           flags.setUnsafeAlgebra();
     1183                 ^
  >> 1184    make[4]: *** [gallivm/lp_bld_misc.lo] Error 1
     1185    make[4]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
     1186    make[4]: Leaving directory `/tmp/km0/spack-stage/spack-stage-cdpqBR/mesa-17.2.3/src/gallium/auxiliary'
  >> 1187    make[3]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     1188    make[3]: Leaving directory `/tmp/km0/spack-stage/spack-stage-cdpqBR/mesa-17.2.3/src/gallium'
  >> 1189    make[2]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     1190    make[2]: Leaving directory `/tmp/km0/spack-stage/spack-stage-cdpqBR/mesa-17.2.3/src'
  >> 1191    make[1]: *** [all] Error 2
     1192    make[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/km0/spack-stage/spack-stage-cdpqBR/mesa-17.2.3/src'
  >> 1193    make: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install visit ^netcdf~mpi ^hdf5~mpi ^vtk+osmesa
```

### Information on your system

1. I am using Linux CentOS 7.x on Intel x86_64
2. No special configuration.
